descriptionHtml:
[size=6]USE [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72642/?]BATTLE MAIDENS LOADSCREENS[/url][/size]  [size=6]INSTEAD![/size]







Credits
Thanks to the following Nexus Users:

[b]lucas035[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/580833/?
[b]SvarogNL[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3136685/?
[b]sanhoshin[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2674607/?
[b]alexander1685[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4087495/?
[b]UnitedStrafes[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5353818/?
[b]crowtrobot[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/416380/?
[b]THEHAG[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1224290/?
[b]Diegog5[/b] : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/439136/?

Permissions:

you may use the template from this mod but none of the images unless you were granted permission from the image creators.

Just make sure if you want to use this as a loadscreen replacer, change the folder path to your texture so it doesn't override any other loadscreen texture from other mods.

So go in each nif file and change the texture path to [interface/(Your_custom_folder)/load_26]

each and every nif file to correspond with the texture so it doesn't override any other custom loadscreen replacers.
author: Soldierkilt
